item.title: NKE
item.description: score:-79 Chances: NIKE (NKE) strategic efforts, including progress on the Consumer Direct Acceleration strategy, appear encouraging. Passive income investors can potentially increase their wealth in the long run by investing in this dividend stock. Risks: Investors should understand the challenges the business is currently facing.
